summary: Completed comprehensive testing of Survey Portal MVP - both backend APIs and frontend functionality working correctly

minor_issues.issue: Withdrawal request fails with insufficient balance for new users
Button correctly disabled when balance < 500 points

passed_tests: Landing page loads with hero, features, stats, providers sections
Dashboard loads with user stats (balance, surveys completed, etc.)
Surveys page shows available surveys from Inbrain and CPX Research
Starting and completing surveys works with automatic balance updates
Survey history page shows completed surveys
Wallet page shows balance, total earned, withdrawal history
All backend API endpoints work correctly
Survey completion flow with simulated progress works
